Journ√© Surcouf!

<size=45>Chapter 2 - Surcouf in the Morning</size>

scripts.say: Port - Commander's Office
Mmh... ah... Where... am I...?
The office...?
That's weird, I could've sworn I went off to wake up the Commander... Guess I dreamt it all up... Alright then, back to sleep...
After using nearly every method I could think of, I finally managed to wake up Surcouf.
You're saying you carried me all the way here from your room?
Hehe, wow~ That must've been a lot of fun for you!
Not so much for me, you know? I was fast asleep, so I don't know the feeling of being carried in your arms.
So I'm offering you the opportunity to do it again! Carry me like a princess!
Surcouf got in position, waiting for me to lift and hold her in my arms.

options.content: Gently whack her on the head

scripts.say: Owie! I wasn't expecting you to hit me for that...
Right, I was wondering another thing! Did anyone catch you in the act of bringing me here? Did they look at you like you were some weird pervert?
If I saw something like that, I'd be like: "that poor girl... She's fast asleep, and the Commander's just carrying her around the place like that? How could anyone do something so cruel..."
How is poor little Surcouf going to get married now that this has happened to her?
Huh? They looked at you all compassionate and accepting, more than anything else...?
Well, I guess this isn't the first time it's happened...
Wait, does this mean they all think I'm annoying and don't care what happens to me?!
Surcouf was unable to contain her shocked reaction.
It's time to get to work.
Darn it... Well, no use thinking too hard about it! I'm ready to start working! Let's do this!
